Description:
We are currently seeking exceptional candidates for the following positions on a Temporary basis (extendable subject to business requirements)to join us for exciting projects.Crew Members - Front of House
Crew Members - Back of House
Baristas
Cooks /ChefsIf you are available to join with and a valid visa for the next three/six months & above and a valid Baladiya card,Skills
Skills: Candidates should be locally available in Kuwait and can join on an immediate basis.

Must be fluent in spoken English and spoken Arabic is an added advantage.
Candidates should have previous experience in Casual Dining/QSR Concepts.
Good customer service skills
Presentable & passionate about the hospitality.

Data.Company Industry: Food & Beverage Production; Catering, Food Service, & Restaurant
